dwinformation_id = #{dwinformationId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.select: select *,d.dept_id,d.dept_name from tb_admin a join tb_dept d on a.dept_id=d.dept_id where d.dept_id=#{deptId}
select *,d.dept_id,d.dept_name from tb_admin a join tb_dept d on a.dept_id=d.dept_id
